Package gameClient.utilities

Class PosTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameClient.utilities.PosTransformer
  • public class PosTransformer
extends java.lang.Object
    this class is responsible to fit the SCREEN and the graph!!

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PosTransformer​(int width, int height, double min_x, double min_y, double max_x, double max_y)
      get the height width of drawing space, and the min max x,y values, generate a transformer from it we would simply apply the transformation on any given Vector3D we get, and return a new within screen position

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void applyResize​(int width, int height)
      on scale of the screen we need to recalculate the transformer
      PosInt transform​(double x, double y)
      use transformation on given x,y
      PosInt transform​(geo_location location)
      use the transformation on geo_location
      Pos transformD​(double x, double y)
      spit out transformation pos but as a double vector.
      Pos transformD​(geo_location location)
      use the rtansformation on geo location but spit out a double version ( more precise and with math )

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
